Name: Washed Up Wizard
About the game: Welcome to Washed Up Wizard, a 3d top-down shooter following the adventures of a crazy wizard with all kinds of magical abilities at your disposal to take down enemies and escape from a multi-dimensional mental hospital. Using his spellbook, he is able to combine many spell components in different ways to make all kinds of spells, each with different effects! Fight your way through many bizarre levels, tackle hoards of monsters, help peculiar creatures, find hidden spell scrolls to get new spells, and take down some crazy bosses! But as real as danger seems, you're just hallucinating... right?
